/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a serene street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The sky is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly in the top left corner, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. 

On either side of the street, there are lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. The street itself is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades bathed in the sunlight. On the right side of the street, there's a large pile of yellow flowers, adding a pop of color to the scene. 

The image beautifully encapsulates the blend of urban architecture and natural beauty that characterizes Beijing. It's a snapshot of a day in the life of this bustling city, captured in a moment of tranquility.
